title: Schindler - revenue 2007 to 2018
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in billion Swiss francs, containing a total of 12 data points.
In general Revenue in billion Swiss francs has fallen over the Year.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
Maximum Revenue in billion Swiss francs, about 14.0 was reported at Year 2008
Minimum Revenue in billion Swiss francs about 7.9 was reached at Year 2011
